job.title: Elixir Software Engineer - Elixir, Elm, Graphql, PostgreSQL
job.description: If you are a Elixir Software Engineer with experience, please read on!  We are an environmental friendly company that works on a real time energy balancing platform. We need an engineer to add new capacities to our Elixir control platform.  What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Elixir Software Engineer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Chris.Cavish@CyberCoders.com Chris Cavish - Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.  CyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
